selectedVerses.text: sharpened for slaughter, polished to flash like lightning!(Or shall we rejoice? You have despised the rod, my son, with everything of wood.)
Why does your heart carry you away, and why do your eyes flash,

"And you, son of man, prophesy, and say, Thus says the Lord GOD concerning the Ammonites and concerning their reproach; say, A sword, a sword is drawn for the slaughter. It is polished to consume and to flash like lightning--
Flash forth the lightning and scatter them; send out your arrows and rout them!
His sneezings flash forth light, and his eyes are like the eyelids of the dawn.
